issue.title: [C++] Follow conda-forge compiler ABI migration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
conda-forge packages will soon (on Jan 15th) be completely migrated to the gcc5 C++ ABI. We will need to update developer documentation, and perhaps fix broken CI builds.

Reference: https://twitter.com/condaforge/status/1083379357840744448

comments.body:
